thread.title: 'Straight Outta Compton' director set for 'Fast & Furious'
thread.title_full: 'Straight Outta Compton' director set for 'Fast & Furious'

title: 'Straight Outta Compton' director set for 'Fast & Furious'
text: > Entertainment 'Straight Outta Compton' director set for 'Fast & Furious' FILE - - In this Aug. 10, 2015 file photo, director F. Gary Gray arrives at the Los Angeles premiere of "Straight Outta Compton" at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. Gray, who made waves this summer with his profitable and critically acclaimed N.W.A biopic, has been set to direct the 8th film in the Fast & Furious franchise. Gray announced the news on his Facebook page on Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. (Photo by John Salangsang/Invision/AP, File)
